content: >this pattern is available also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want option >this pattern is my christmas / holiday season 2022 gift for all sock knitters **pattern features ** - designed for approx 20-30 grams of c1 variegated yellow 10-15 grams of c2 black and 40-60 grams of c3 brown - knitted cuff down - instructions written in metric and us terminology - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - three sizes small 60 sts medium/large 70 sts and extra-large 80 sts - slipped-stitch heel flap and round heel turn - charts but no written instructions for stranded colourwork 1 https //payhip com/product/edit/kmype
